name: The McCrary Sisters
description: '''The McCrary Sisters''' are an American [[gospel music]] group from [[Nashville, Tennessee|Nashville]], Tennessee, formed in 2010 by sisters [[Ann McCrary]], Deborah McCrary, Regina McCrary, and Alfreda McCrary. They have released four [[studio album]]s and one [[live album]]: ''Our Journey'' (2010), ''All the Way'' (2013), ''Let's Go'' (2015), ''Live'' (2017) and ''A Very McCrary Christmas'' (2019).
